title: Mitsuwano
synopsis: In Kyoto, apprentices known as maiko are skilled performers of traditional dance and song. It is said their elegance and grace leaves any audience entranced.
staff: [['Igari, Takashi', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Kameyama, Toshiki', ['Sound Director']], ['Takahashi, Natsuko', ['Script']], ['Horie, Yui', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
